title: Looping Through Numbers
description: Write a program that uses a for loop to iterate through numbers from 1 to 10 and prints each number. If the number is even, it should print 'Even' next to the number. If the number is odd, it should print 'Odd' next to the number.
sample_output:
1 Odd
2 Even
3 Odd
4 Even
5 Odd
6 Even
7 Odd
8 Even
9 Odd
10 Even
